segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with sunlight streaming in from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman standing by the sink, carefully drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so focused on that dish, like nothing else matters right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over by the cabinets, a little boy is climbing on a stool to reach something high up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing nearby, reaching up with her hand as if she's waiting for him to pass her something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden outside, all neat and peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wait, is that water running from the faucet into the sink?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh no, it's overflowing and spilling onto the floor!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman has one foot in the puddle but doesn't seem to notice at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And that stool the boy is on looks wobbly, like it might tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around soon and sees what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR
